explanation-1.title: Turn up your business by leveraging the latest location technology
explanation-1.description: Install motio sensors in your retail store to start giving personalized notifications, recommendations and benefits based on micro-location.

explanation-2.title: Our solution
explanation-2.description: Motio helps retailers leverage the power of mobile to attract and influence consumers while they shop in the store. It integrates brick and mortar and online channels into one, allowing a retail store to deliver discounts, benefits and content relevant to the customers location while touring the store.
